# Dropdown Menu Item

## Usage:

```html
<p-dropdown-menu-item>Content</p-dropdown-menu-item>
```

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                             | Type      | Default |
| -------- | --------- | --------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `active` | `active`  | Wether the dropdown menu item is active | `boolean` | `false` |
